name: Ideal It Techno Pvt. Ltd.
tagline: Full Stack developer for Mobile Apps
description:
We are a renowned and fastest thriving IT Firm in Central India and delivering prominent applications and websites from last 3 years having 50 full time experienced developers team and auspiciously delivered 150+applications(Our app also selected featured app on iTunes) and 40+websites Approx.

Outstanding team of professionals in turning client idea into efficacious applications and websites. No burden for client as we handle all work from preparing documentation till fully developed project. We provide practical solutions with personal touch to your ideas.
Proficient for developing Applications with the emerging Technologies:
✔ Mobile App:
- Android: Building solutions for smartphones and tablets, across multiple OS (2.3 – 5.0) including latest Android Marshmallow (6.0) and across multiple form factors and devices.
- iOS: Building solutions for iPhone, iPod touch, iPad and iPad mini, across multiple OS iOS 6 , iOS 7 , iOS 8 and iOS 9 including latest devices like iPhone 6 , iPhone 6+,  iPhone 6S.
✔ Web , Backend Panel and Webservices:
- We work on latest PHP platform across multiple Web Frameworks (Laravel , Codeigniter) , Webservices (Slim , Lumin) and CMS (Wordpress , custom CMS), Database (MongoDB , MySql) & also expertise for Node.js , Angular.js , MEAN.io
 
READ MORE...

locations.address: Block GH 03, Sundaram Complex, Bhawarkuan main road, Tower square
